title: Flight operations at Karachi, Sialkot, Lahore aiports temporarily suspended: PAA - DAWN.COM
content:
Flight operations at Karachi, Lahore and Sialkot airports have been temporarily suspended, according to a statement by the Pakistan Airports Authority (PAA).

Karachi, Lahore and Sialkot airports will not be available till 12pm on Thursday, PAA added.

The statement, issued by PAA spokesperson Saifullah Khan, requested passengers to remain in contact with the relevant airlines to remain updated with the latest information.

The PAA also issued a Notam for the decision.
